techs.name: Siege Craft
techs.quote: 'Do not wait to strike til the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.' - William Butler Yeats

techs.name: Mathematics
techs.quote: 'Without mathematics, there's nothing you can do. Everything around you is mathematics. Everything around you is numbers.' - Shakuntala Devi

techs.name: Currency
techs.quote: 'Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.' - Epictetus

techs.name: Milling
techs.quote: 'Instrumental or mechanical science is the noblest and, above all others, the most useful.' - Leonardo da Vinci

techs.name: Construction
techs.quote: 'Create with the heart; build with the mind.' - Criss Jami

techs.name: Engineering
techs.quote: 'Normal people, believe that if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it. Engineers believe that if it ain’t broke, it doesn’t have enough features yet.' - Scott Adams

techs.name: Theology
